sentences.sContent: Ask your father to help you.
Andrew was very excited about becoming a father.
sentences.sCn: 安德鲁初为人父，非常激动。

sentences.sContent: Freud is the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.sCn: 弗洛伊德是精神分析之父。

...and so from the age of two her father took her with him to work and taught her about stocks and shares...
...The author later realized he had caused great distress to his father by asking why he was wrongly addressed...
...One reason the author's father could sit and eat at the drug store was that he didn't look that dark...
...I realize that what distressed my father wasn't so much the Mr...
